official_title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on power-driven weaving machines for weaving fabrics more than 4.9 meters in width.

summary.text: Extends from December 31, 1990, to December 31, 1992, the suspension of duty on certain power-driven weaving machines.

titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on power-driven weaving machines for weaving fabrics more than 4.9 meters in width.
